lyrics.ChnStr: 塞納河畔 左岸的咖啡
lyrics.EngStr: By the Seine River, coffee on the left bank

lyrics.ChnStr: 我手一杯 品嚐你的美
lyrics.EngStr: I hold a cup, savoring your beauty

lyrics.ChnStr: 留下唇印的嘴
lyrics.EngStr: A mouth with a lipstick mark left

lyrics.ChnStr: 花店玫瑰 名字寫錯誰
lyrics.EngStr: A rose from the flower shop, who wrote the wrong name?

lyrics.ChnStr: 告白氣球 風吹到對街
lyrics.EngStr: A confession balloon, blown to the opposite street

lyrics.ChnStr: 微笑在天上飛
lyrics.EngStr: A smile flying in the sky

lyrics.ChnStr: 你說你有點難追 想讓我知難而退
lyrics.EngStr: You said you are a bit hard to chase, hoping I would give up

lyrics.ChnStr: 禮物不需挑最貴 只要香榭的落葉
lyrics.EngStr: No need to choose the most expensive gift, just the leaves from Champs-Élysées

lyrics.ChnStr: 營造浪漫的約會 不害怕搞砸一切
lyrics.EngStr: Creating a romantic date, not afraid of messing everything up

lyrics.ChnStr: 擁有你就擁有 全世界
lyrics.EngStr: With you, I have the whole world

lyrics.ChnStr: 親愛的 愛上你 從那天起
lyrics.EngStr: Darling, I fell in love with you from that day

lyrics.ChnStr: 甜蜜的很輕易
lyrics.EngStr: Sweetness comes so easily

lyrics.ChnStr: 親愛的 別任性 你的眼睛
lyrics.EngStr: Darling, don't be willful, your eyes

lyrics.ChnStr: 在說我願意
lyrics.EngStr: Are saying, 'I am willing'

lyrics.ChnStr: 親愛的 愛上你 戀愛日記
lyrics.EngStr: Darling, falling in love with you, a love diary

lyrics.ChnStr: 飄香水的回憶
lyrics.EngStr: Memories of the scent of perfume

lyrics.ChnStr: 一整瓶 的夢境 全都有你
lyrics.EngStr: A whole bottle of dreams, all filled with you

lyrics.ChnStr: 攪拌在一起
lyrics.EngStr: Stirred together

lyrics.ChnStr: 親愛的別任性 你的眼睛
lyrics.EngStr: Darling, don't be willful, your eyes

lyrics.ChnStr: 在說我願意
lyrics.EngStr: Are saying, 'I am willing'
